summary: AN ORDINANCE vacating portions of Swamp Place South, 39th, 42nd, 43rd, and 44th Avenues South, South Oregon Street, and Alleys and/or Creek Rights of Way in Blocks 29 and 30, Squire's Lakeside Addition; and also transferring partial jurisdiction over certain City (Department of Parks and Recreation) property in Block 8 and Block 35, Maynard's Lake Washington Addition, and portions of vacated 43rd Avenue South, 44th Avenue South, and South Oregon Street to the Department of Engineering to permit construction and maintenance of existing storm drain and sanitary sewer facilities with appurtenances; and also repealing Ordinance 98751 relating to storm drains. (Resolution No. 25268 and Comptroller File No. 289411).
